I'd have to say all characters being equal would definatly dull the game. 
Sure, some characters are stronger, but for those you charge more money. 
Everyone is talking about the Archmage and Cleric, but when I player I 
personally preferred the archer. once you got exploding bolt there weere 
very few enemies that could present more than tolkien resistance except in 
massive numbers, and in a way massive numbers is the comfort zone of 
exploding bolt. So, although maybe not as powerful as archmagi, the archer 
is cheap and effective. Like said before, all classes have their powers, be 
it their so cheap you could buy enough to swarm any enemy or that they can 
bust threw opposing lines if enough money is invested in them.
